The Indonesian central bank: Bank of Indonesia (BI), issued a new Indonesian 75,000 rupiah bill on August 17, 2020, to celebrate the 75th anniversary of Indonesian independence, and it is referred to as a "commemorative bill."
The Indonesian central bank confirmed in: 2020, that the new bill is legal tender and has the same function as other existing banknotes.
The back of the bill includes a sentence: BY THE GRACE OF GOD ALMIGHTY, THE UNITARY REPUBLIC OF INDONESIA HAS ISSUED RUPIAH AS LEGAL TENDER WITH THE VALUE OF SEVENTY-FIVE THOUSAND RUPIAH."
